name: Pixel Ripped 1989
description: Pixel Ripped 1989 is a wacky multi-dimensional homage to the early days of gaming. The player embarks on a journey into the screen of a classic videogame and beyond.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960, AMD Radeon R9 270 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-3770 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 280 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
